titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Parliament of the Commonwealth of England for a time of publique thanksgiving, upon the five and twentieth of this instant August, for the great victory lately vouchsafed to their fleet at sea.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Field, Printer to the Parliament of England,

notesStmt.note: Order to print dated: Friday the Twelfth of August, 1653. Signed: Hen: Scobell, Clerk of the Parliament.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
